# field

**Instance Property**

A structure containing 3-axis calibrated magnetic field data. See the description of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticField] structure.

## Declaration

```swift
var field: CMMagneticField
```

## Accessing the Field Values

- **accuracy**: An enum-constant value that indicates the accuracy of the magnetic field estimate. See [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy].
